attributes.action: Trial by jury has to be kept - judged by peers is a foundation to our democracy!
attributes.additional_details: A complete back track from this undemocratic proposal to a fundamental change to our legal system.
attributes.background: Reneging on a key principle of our laws cannot be progressed without provable support from all people of this nation.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do not remove trial by jury for certain cases
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751480
